tool.name: Compare VCF with 1000 Genomes

param.name: inputVCF
param.label: VCF to compare
param.help: This is your vcf you wish to compare against 1000 Genomes

param.name: high_or_low1
param.label: Less than or qual to OR greater than or equal to?

param.name: filter_af1
param.label: Filter your VCF by AF less than or equal to
param.help: Filter your VCF by Allele Frequencies less than or equal to some number

param.name: select_by
param.label: Select what to filter by
param.help: You can select all, just SNPs or just INDELs

param.name: high_or_low2
param.label: Less than or qual to OR greater than or equal to?

param.name: filter_af2
param.label: Filter end VCF by AF less than or equal to
param.help: Filter end VCF by Allele Frequencies less than or equal to some number

tool.help: This will search through the 1000 Genomes VCF and compare your vcf filtered by AF against it and then filter the result by AF as well.
